name: HadithAl-Qudsi
0:
”Alexa open Hadith Al Qudsi”
”Alexa launch Hadith Al Qudsi”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hadith al qudsi
des:
Ask for Hadith al Qudsi and listen to Hadith easily without having to open any book. 
Listening to Hadith or Narration of Prophet will increase the Iman (belief). 

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Hadith Al Qudsi" or "Alexa, open Hadith Al Qudsi" to listen to a Hadith".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
